text: Asplenium ecuadorense is a species of fern in the family Aspleniaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests and subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== ecuadorense Category:Ferns of Ecuador Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador Category:Ferns of the Americas Category:Near threatened flora of South America Category:Plants described in 1984 Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Asplenium ecuadorense
